alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Henry; Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:58PM EDT until July 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Randolph County in east central Indiana... Southern Delaware County in east central Indiana... Northeastern Henry County in east central Indiana... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Muncie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Summit Lake State Park and Ball State University around 510 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Blountsville, Prairie Creek Reservoir, Selma, Parker City and Farmland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
